website_summaries.verdict: The Yamaha PRO 400 is a powerful headphone pair that forgoes booming bass and sculpted highs for a clean focus on the midrange.
pros: Powerful audio performance, with distortion-free bass and a focus on the midrange
Comes with two cables, one with inline remote and microphone for mobile devices
cons: Can get uncomfortable over long listening sessions
Rubbery underside of headband is dust, pet hair magnet

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 years, then stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with these headphones for over three years. The sound was spectacular and I didn't have any issues with the fit. Unfortunately, they have stopped working. I might get sound in one ear or the other, never both, and sometimes neither. I have tried different headphone cords without success. I expected that a pair of headphones this pricey would last, but apparently I was mistaken. Shame on you Yamaha
customer_reviews.author: Cory T

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These headphones provide outstanding sound quality. It initially fits a little tight on your head, but becomes more comfortable with use. It is noise suppressing vs. noise canceling...which is a little safer, as you are aware what is happening around you. However I must again say how great the music sounds. I use them late at night, as not to disturb those around me, at the same time hearing my music they way it's supposed to be heard. (No artificial bass or treble.) It is an outstanding value!
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic headband/highs not crisp enough
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these headphones 2 years ago. Headband is now broken at the 10 o clock position and is cracking at the 2 o clock position. Cheap plastic. Headphones also need crisper highs. Headphones were used normally. I have many Yamaha musical products and am happy with all of them except for these headphones. Yamaha really dropped the ball on these $300 headphones!
customer_reviews.author: tina trainor

customer_reviews.title: ... a month I think and I am really enjoying like the clarity of the headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really dig these cans I've had them for a little over a month I think and I am really enjoying like the clarity of the headphones. Admittedly before these I would be wearing like thirty dollar skull Candy's so of course this is a huge improvement. Just a note though sometimes like it won't play music for like a minute, but I'm not sure if that's the cans or the device its being connected to.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Collins

customer_reviews.title: Neat sound, perfect fit, beautiful peace.
customer_reviews.text: Neat sound, perfect fit. A little bit too heavy. Its a beautiful peace, neat design, great material and most important great sound. After the vape period sound remain neat. The only issue is the the weight is a little bit heavy for long periods of use.
customer_reviews.author: Noe Luzon

customer_reviews.title: very nice set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound great! Love the flexibility of having a choice between the iOS cable and 10 ft cable home audio cable. They fit me very well and are very comfortable also, the super-plush case is an added bonus. I have a 12+ year old set of Grado sr80's and wanted these for commuter train use, the folding and sound isolating Yamaha's are perfect for the train and their sound stacks up well compared to the Grado's.....
customer_reviews.author: glenrexellyn

customer_reviews.title: very pretty but not fits in skinny
customer_reviews.text: High perfomance, very pretty but not fits in skinny faces
customer_reviews.author: Arturo

customer_reviews.title: excellent  earphone which deserve its price
customer_reviews.text: it has nice shape and good sound so i am so happy for buying it .yamaha's product is sure excellent.
customer_reviews.author: chen zhenhong

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have the Beats. These blow them away in sound quality and cost less! Best headphone for the $$$
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my broken Tm-1s with these bad boys.
customer_reviews.text: After a fatal accident with my Tm-1's, I took on a mission to find a better replacement. Did I hit a gold mind with these Pro 400's. To a tee exactly what I was looking for in comfort, quality and style. Strongly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound. A bit bulky
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound. A bit bulky. Comfortable. No complaints with these at all. Phone calls are really nice thru the headsets
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is ok, slightly above average. The look is fantastic! The fit is odd...not bad, but overly engineered maybe...which is kinda crazy for something like fit. For the price I was expecting a little more.
customer_reviews.author: xerostatic

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers on the headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers on the headphones, but the comfort and quality of the actual piece is so-so. The speakers really close in hard on your temples, and if you wear glasses don't wear them longer than 20 minutes, because they'll press them in so hard that you'll feel a stabbing pain on each side. Also the headphones are attached to the headband by two mirrored metal pins, of which one broke off within 3 months, rendering the headphones unwearable since one of the speakers now hangs loosely. I'd consider other options.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The build quality of Ear phones are too good and gives a premium look. The audio is very good high and low trebles and for sharp beats. Bass is above average. Comfort - 3.5/5 Audio - 4.5/5 Looks - 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Ganny

customer_reviews.title: excellent ear phones
customer_reviews.text: excellent ear phones. the white ear phones with my white yamaha grand dgx650 keyboard, the white keyboard stand. --a beautiful set-up for any home . could not be any nicer combo on the market. art pepin
customer_reviews.author: ART PEPIN

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Good quality of construction
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Good quality of construction. Sound quality is good. Uncomfortable for the ear after wearing it for about 30 min.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Not as good quality as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Not as good quality as I hoped. Worked well when it worked. But now one of the ears doesn't have noise coming out which is a shame
customer_reviews.author: Alton

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great sound, good isolation of external noise, sits comfortable in my ears. After about 1 hous ears hurt a little, but that is to be expected if you want good sound isolation.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Barcellos Silveira

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, nice bass and clear high frequency
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, nice bass and clear high frequency, but the frame is too weak. After using 3 month, a crack began to grow on the frames (near where the metal piece is located), and it broke within 6 months. I used instant glue and glued it, used it for another 6 months, and it broke again, so now I don't use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kyuwon Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound great, but they broke the first time I dropped them.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Too uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Music wise is as good as other Yamaha MT 220 I got. But, even for a large head like mine, not fit. Ear pads are for children.They are going into the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Juan E.

customer_reviews.title: These are the best for the
customer_reviews.text: We have tried them all. These are the best for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jill B

customer_reviews.title: These are good quality headphones with extreme clarity
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality headphones with extreme clarity. I'd prefer a little more bass to come through but overall, a quality piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed by the quality and comfort that these headphones provided ...
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed by the quality and comfort that these headphones provided for my listening pleasure. Made other headphones seem cheap in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Zura

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros- Nice sleek design, I don't get the heavy feeling or ear fatigue some have reported and I primarily use them when gaming on my PS4, and more importantly the sound is just amazing!!! Cons- Fingerprints on the shinny black, scratches are noticeable, outer plastic could be made to feel more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: What a craker. When I open the box, ...
customer_reviews.text: What a craker. When I open the box, left headset was broken. I should read the reviewer's comment. I suppose to return, but I live in abroad, I should take 100$ to turn in. I complain in Korean Yamaha center, but this product(all yamaha product) do not world warranty, so I paid 100$ for repair. I will never buy yamaha product any more!
customer_reviews.author: kim min keun

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these for my son and he loved them until one side stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my son and he loved them until one side stopped working. I told him no problem, I got them on Amazon prime so I will just exchange them, to then find out I ordered them 32 days ago so I could not exchange them because I was two days past their exchange policy. Now I have spent a lot on a "good" pair of headphones that don't work and there is nothing I can do about it. His cheep pair did not sound as good but they still work!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: ... and bought the Beats headphone that Yamaha is far superior in sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I already had one and bought the Beats headphone that Yamaha is far superior in sound quality, but is not as famous, especially in Brazil. Recommend, I'm loving the experience.MAC
customer_reviews.author: Marcio Caldellas

product_meta.title: Yamaha PRO 400 High-Fidelity Over-Ear Headphones (Ivory White)
product_meta.description:
Color:Ivory White| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingFROM THE MANUFACTURER


YAMAHA PRO 400 HIGH-FIDELITY OVER-EAR HEADPHONES
 
IF YOU LOVE MUSIC, LISTEN TO THE PROS




As the world's largest musical instrument manufacturer and the leading choice of professionals for studio and concert gear, Yamaha knows better than anyone how to make your music sound its absolute best. Now you can enjoy the Studio Sound experience anywhere you go. PRO Series headphones go beyond just "powerful bass" to authentically reproduce any style of music. From Classic Rock to Hip-Hop, from Latin Jazz to Delta Blues, the PRO Series brings all your music to life. Your collection is waiting…





POWERFUL, AUTHENTIC SOUND
Tight, precise, and well-balanced – the PRO 400 headphones create a rich, deep soundscape isolated from the outside world and tuned to perfection the way only Yamaha can. They incorporate a newly-developed Yamaha-proprietary driver design, sporting robust 50 mm drivers with neodymium magnets that provide maximum efficiency when used with mobile devices such as smartphones, tablets and other portable music players. The over-ear cup shape offers excellent noise isolation, while premium ear cushion materials insure crisp, clear sound reproduction.








ULTRA-COMFORTABLE AND BUILT TO LAST
Built to handle the rigors of everyday use without wearing you down, the PRO 400 features an adjustable, reinforced headband with ample padding textured for a pleasant feel. The band is shaped to apply just the right amount of pressure – snug enough to provide noise isolation, yet light enough for long listening sessions. Its ear cushions are extraordinarily soft and smooth, with a feel so natural you’ll never want to take it off.





FUEL-INJECTED DESIGN
Drawing inspiration from the world's finest musical instruments and motorcycles, the PRO Series headphones get your heart racing before you even plug them in. Gorgeous geometry and ultra-clean design curves are matched with premium color and finish materials, and emblazoned boldly with Yamaha's iconic tuning-fork marque, conjuring the power and energy of our high-performance supersport bikes. The PRO 400 is available in Piano Black and Ivory White.





VERSATILE, HIGH-PERFORMANCE CONNECTIVITY
The PRO 400 comes with two detachable, tangle-resistant flat cables: one in a 4 ft length with an in-line remote/mic, ideal for most mobile applications, and one in a 10 ft length for use in the home. Both cables are made from a material that is durable and designed to reduce "touch noise" transfer effects. The flat construction keeps the internal cores separated to minimize interference and terminates to a low-profile right-angle connector. A gold-plated ¼" adapter is included in the box for connecting to professional-grade audio equipment.





CONTROL AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
The 4 ft cable includes an in-line remote/microphone optimized for use with Apple iPod, iPhone and iPad devices. The "+" and "-" buttons control volume for both music and phone calls, while the center button allows you to play/pause music, skip to the next song, skip to the previous song, or answer/end phone calls. The controller buttons provide a tactile click-response, enabling intuitive operation without need for visual reference. For non-Apple devices, control behavior varies due to differences in applications and pin configurations.





BRING IT WITH YOU…EVERYWHERE
Engineered to move you and keep you moving, the PRO 400 folds into a compact size for traveling. It also comes with a semi-rigid protective carrying case.





WHICH YAMAHA PRO SERIES HEADPHONE IS RIGHT FOR YOU?
YAMAHA PRO 300
Check out the Yamaha PRO 300 YAMAHA PRO 400
Check out the Yamaha PRO 400 YAMAHA PRO 500

CABLE B: 10 ft (3 m) detachable, tangle-resistant flat cable CABLE A: 4 ft (1.2 m) detachable, tangle-resistant flat cable with remote/mic optimized for Apple devices; CABLE B: 10 ft (3 m) detachable, tangle-resistant flat cable Connectors Gold-plated 1/8” (3.5 mm) L-type mini stereo CABLE A: 1/8” (3.5 mm) male-to-male mini stereo with L-type on one side; CABLE B: 1/8” (3.5 mm) male-to-male mini stereo CABLE A: Gold-plated 1/8” (3.5 mm) male-to-male mini stereo with L-type on one end; CABLE B: 1/8" (3.5 mm) male-to-male mini stereo In the Box Soft carrying case; gold-plated 1/4” adapter; cleaning cloth Semi-rigid carrying case; detachable, tangle-resistant flat cable (4 ft/1.2 m) with in-line remote/mic optimized for Apple devices; 10 ft (3 m) detachable, tangle-resistant flat cable; gold-plated 1/4” adapter; cleaning cloth Semi-rigid carrying case; detachable, tangle-resistant flat cable (4 ft/1.2 m) with in-line remote/mic optimized for Apple devices; detachable, tangle-resistant flat cable (10 ft/3 m); gold-plated 1/4” adapter; cleaning cloth
feature_bullets: Combines the finest materials with legendary Yamaha tuning know-how to deliver a superb listening experience
Ear cushions are extraordinarily soft and smooth, with a feel so natural you will never want to take them off
Offers an in-line remote/microphone on the 4-foot cable that is optimized for use with Apple devices
PRO Series cables are flat, tangle-resistant and made from a material that is both durable and designed to reduce touch noise transfer effects
Gorgeous geometry and ultra-clean design curves are matched with premium color and finish materials, then emblazoned boldly with the Yamaha iconic tuning-fork marque
